properties.entry: SELECT DONATION_NO, DONA_PRICE, DONA_KIND, DONA_DATE, USER_ID FROM DONATION JOIN MEMBER USING (USER_NO) WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "TOTAL", SUM(DONA_PRICE) "SUM" FROM DONATION JOIN MEMBER USING (USER_NO) WHERE USER_ID = ?

SELECT * FROM MEMBERGRADE WHERE (SELECT SUM(DONA_PRICE) FROM DONATION WHERE USER_NO = ? GROUP BY USER_NO) > MIN_DONA AND MAX_DONA > (SELECT SUM(DONA_PRICE) FROM DONATION WHERE USER_NO = ? GROUP BY USER_NO)
INSERT INTO DONATION( DONATION_NO, DONA_PRICE, DONA_KIND, DONA_DATE, USER_NO ) VALUES( 'DO' || SEQ_DONATION_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, SYSDATE, ? )
